title: The Shepherd and the Fairy
subtle: Fairy Tale (fiction), 874 words, Level N (Grade 2), Lexile 570L
description: The Shepherd and the Fairy is a rags-to-riches-to-rags Corsican fairy tale about a young man who wins the love of a magical fairy. The fairy makes him wealthy when he agrees to be her husband, but he succumbs to the temptation of wanting a better love and more worldly goods. In the end, he is left with nothing.
